 You want to learn how to develop a suite of deep learning methods to get more from new
or existing time series forecasting problems.
This guide was written in the top-down and results-ﬁrst machine learning style that you’re
used to from Machine Learning Mastery.
About Your Outcomes
This book will teach you the practical deep learning skills that you need to know for time series
forecasting. After reading and working through this book, you will know:
